text: Pathian chongkachoi ngai diangnga Pathian chong-inkhitna kha nangnisik kha eii, halli ningpi-ningpu ngai diangnga inphut chong-inkhitna khan nangni'n tum ningnei eii. Tichu Pathian in Abraham diang ati, ‘Ningtusuon-ningtesuon makheiya kei'n nuoipilchung miring rakip chungnga rawaan kapesik eii. Inphut 22:18
